functionalities.@value: Should be able to generate points based on the information of the billing component?
Should be able to read the number of points to be transferred on the basis of the contract/consent BB
Should be able to transfer or distribute the points
Should be able to store the points in an immutable database
Should be able to automate the number of points distribution for individuals
Verify a consent and its validity

The data product provider and the data licensor should agree on the number and percentage of points to be shared, which should be specified in the contract or declaration of consent, or if possible use the Shapley value in the data product provider (service) to automatically determine an appropriate percentage of points.
Should be able to facilitate generation of token (based on selected blockchain ecosystem) from the points
